message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

The paper presents a novel convolutional neural network-based approach for accurate segmentation of sub-cortical brain structures in MRI images. This involves combining both convolutional and prior spatial features for improving segmentation accuracy. The paper also proposes a restricted sample selection strategy to force the network to learn the most difficult parts of the structures. Given these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are computer vision (cs.CV), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and multimedia (cs.MM).
